WorkItem.Description:
Hello..
I have a problem.
I play a song displaying subtitles. Everything is ok when I dont use rewind and fast forward but when I use them the CurrentTime is not the same as it was at the begining.
The time difference is bigger at the end of mp3.
Subtitles are late more then few seconds.
What can I do if I want to have precision CurrentTime after use FF and Revind.

Comments.Message: hi there, I imagine that CurrentTime won't work very well with MP3s, particularly if they are VBR MP3s. This is something I would like to fix in a future version

i will look forward for new version.
thanks.
MP3 current time and Length should be accurate now
